collection.name: Notes from a Crazed Researcher
collection.openText: The final chapter ends with the phrase: “Born again.”

specialTipSize.specialTip: Those who equip $0 will benefit from a sharp increase in the stats related to Temperance.
If ordered to return $0 within 30 seconds of equipping, the user’s skin will start to swell and their body will explode within seconds.
If ordered to return $0 without performing any sort of managerial work, the user will explode.
If the user receives a certain amount of damage, they will explode, and the explosion will cover the entire section. The explosion will deal massive RED damage to all nearby.
